plot: As the first-born son, 21-year-old Scion Sasaki is destined to take over his family's Buddhist temple in Kyoto - a temple that has existed for 800 years, handed down by his ancestors for 23...
title: Monk by Blood
plot_es: As the first-born son, 21-year-old Scion Sasaki is destined to take over his family's Buddhist temple in Kyoto - a temple that has existed for 800 years, handed down by his ancestors for 23...
